page.title: 10A SCHOOL DAY _ 1985
page.content: My name is Mark Johnson. I am 10 years old and go to school in Spalding. At 7 o'clock I get up. At 7.30 I have my breakfast and then watch television. I go to school at 8.30 and then we start school at 8.55. At the start of the morning we have Assembly and then we have lessons in Mathematics, English, and P.E. Half-way through the morning we have a 15 minute break. At 12 o'clock we have a lunch break until 1.10 . I take sandwiches to school to eat at lunch time. During the afternoon we useally do project work and art and craft and listen to a story. We finish school at 3.30 and then I play until it is my tea time at 5.30. At 9.30 I go to bed.
